attributes.action: The reintroduction of National Service to all unemployed 18-24 year olds.
attributes.additional_details: The youth of today need to have values installed in them such as respect for authority and sell worth. Any youth who does not gain employment or continue in further education should be called up to serve  their country. Not to be used as front line troops but used in roles such as guarding UK interests around the globe such as Gibraltar . Helping with humanitarian aid and projects around the world. Be trained in various skills that can be used in every day civilian roles such as engineering and medical.
